msg: Making archiva-jpox-database-refactor branch the new trunk.

author: joakime
msg: Performing swap out of trunk to branch-0.9.

author: jkuhnert
msg: Took howardlewwiship.com repo out and replaced it with opencomponentry.com as there is nothing needed by the framework in that repo anymore.

author: jkuhnert
msg: There was a bug in the event connection visitor where it wouldn't take into account that multiple pages may be loaded in a single threaded service run and so incorrectly thought all forms had been found for a particular page when they were actually just the last pages forms.
Also fixed bug where RenderBody wasn't able to correctly be iterated over for containing components because of the special relationship between it and BaseComponent.
